php.LBL_MAIL_RBL_DESCRIPTION: Configurez les serveurs de messagerie RBL pour détecter le spam et définir les expéditeurs de confiance.
php.LBL_ALERT_FAKE_SENDER: The email address in the From field has been forged.
php.LBL_SERVER_NAME_FROM_DESC: The server name that the sending computer gave for itself (often the sending software name)
php.LBL_SERVER_NAME_BY_DESC: The server name that the recipient computer gave for itself (often the sending software name, if there is no sender, the message is passed internally)
php.LBL_SPF_NONE_DESC: Unable to verify if the sender server is authorized to send messages on behalf of '%s'
php.LBL_SPF_PASS_DESC: The sender server is authorized to send messages on behalf of '%s'
php.LBL_SPF_FAIL_DESC: The sender server is not authorized to send messages on behalf of '%s'
php.LBL_DKIM_NONE_DESC: A digital signature (DKIM) has not been configured on the sender server
php.LBL_DKIM_PASS_DESC: The digital signature of the sender server (DKIM) matches the digital signature of the sender.
php.LBL_DKIM_FAIL_DESC: The digital signature (DKIM) of the sender server does not match the digital signature of the sender or has been forged.
php.LBL_DMARC_NONE_DESC: No data to confirm the sender's domain
php.LBL_DMARC_PASS_DESC: The sender server has confirmation of the sender's domain
php.LBL_DMARC_FAIL_DESC: The sender server does not have confirmation of the sender's domain
php.LBL_NO_DMARC_DNS: Aucun enregistrement DMARC publié dans '%s' DNS
php.LBL_UPLOAD_WRONG_FILE: Please upload correct file to import IP addresses
